{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04117v1", "title": "Topology of KK-theory via inverse limits of discrete abelian groups", "summary": "This paper seeks to characterize some topological properties of pro-countable
abelian topological groups. Using the Milnor exact sequence given by the
controlled picture of $KK$-theory by Willett and Yu, we describe topological
properties of the topological group $KK(A,B)$ with respect to the satisfaction
of Mittag-Leffler and stability conditions of certain inverse systems.", "main_category": "math.KT", "categories": "math.KT,math.OA", "published": "2025-05-07T04:18:38Z"}
